revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RX3041 |revision=(G) |asin= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=PRO-NETS |manuf_model= |availability= |type=router |fcc_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=WavePlus |cpu1_model=WP3221 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV400CBTC-70G |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V641620FTP-H |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |serial= |jtag= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=00:1F:C6 }} {{TagLine|Broadband Router with 4-port switch}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wired_Routers_Switches/RX3041/ Product page] (n/a) {{•}} [http://www.asus.com/Networking/RX3041_B/ Product page] (RX3041 B) "G170051401210", "V2.1" is silkscreened on the board. *[https://picasaweb.google.com/etthtech/AsusRX3041GV21RU Pictures] (ASUS RX3041G V21 RU) ===See also=== *[[ASUS RX3041]] (G) • ''Broadband Router'' *[[ASUS RX3041 rev B]] • [https://www.asus.com/event/network/EOL-product/ EoL products] *[[ASUS RX3041H]] • [http://www.thg.ru/network/20051110/index.html Review] *[[ASUS RX3042H]] • [http://www.thg.ru/network/asus_rx3042h/index.html Review] *[[ASUS RX3141]] • [http://www.thg.ru/network/asus_rx3141/index.html Review] *[[ASUS SL500]] • ''Internet Security Router'' *[[ASUS SL1000]] • ''Internet Security Router'' • [http://www.thg.ru/network/20040612/index.html Review] :CPU: [[Philips]] PTD2210 @133MHz (MIPS w/ IPsec) :LAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8201BL/RTL8305SB (5x FE ports) *[[ASUS SL1200]] • ''Internet Security Router'' • [https://old.nag.ru/files/cte/0007/863.jpg PCB] :CPU: [[Ikanos]] IKF6834 (Fusiv Vx200) :LAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8305SC ==Images== :''ASUS RX3141'' ---- ---- [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
